briefdescription.para: Main mutex to protect most data members that can be modified concurrently.
Joined vector layers.
Adds a list of features in joined layers.

detaileddescription.para: Features given in parameter are those added in target layer. If a corresponding joined feature yet exists in a joined layer, then this feature is just updated. Note that if a corresponding joined feature has only empty fields, then it's not created nor added.

parameterdescription.para: The list of features added in the target layer
Unused parameter

simplesect.para: false if an error happened, true otherwise

briefdescription.para: Joins another vector layer to this layer.

parameterdescription.para: join object containing join layer id, target and source field

simplesect.para: (since 2.6) whether the join was successfully added

memberdef.argsstring: (QgsFeatureId fid, int field, const QVariant &newValue, const QVariant &oldValue=QVariant())
memberdef.name: changeAttributeValue

briefdescription.para: Changes attribute value in joined layers.

detaileddescription.para: The feature id given in parameter is the one added in target layer. If the corresponding joined feature does not exist in a joined layer, then it's automatically created if its fields are not empty.

parameterdescription.para: The feature id
The field to update
The new value of the attribute
The old value of the attribute

simplesect.para: false if an error happened, true otherwise

briefdescription.para: Changes attributes' values in joined layers.

detaileddescription.para: The feature id given in parameter is the one added in target layer. If the corresponding joined feature does not exist in a joined layer, then it's automatically created if its fields are not empty.

parameterdescription.para: The feature id
The new values for attributes
The old values for attributes

simplesect.para: false if an error happened, true otherwise

briefdescription.para: Create a copy of the join buffer.
Quick way to test if there is any join at all.
Calls cacheJoinLayer() for all vector joins.
Deletes a feature from joined layers.

detaileddescription.para: The feature id given in parameter is the one coming from the target layer.

parameterdescription.para: The feature id from the target layer to delete

simplesect.para: false if an error happened, true otherwise

briefdescription.para: Deletes a list of features from joined layers.

detaileddescription.para: Feature ids given in a parameter are those coming from the target layer.

parameterdescription.para: Feature ids from the target layer to delete

simplesect.para: false if an error happened, true otherwise

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the join information is about auxiliary layer, false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: The join information

simplesect.para: true if the join information is about auxiliary layer, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: Returns the joined feature corresponding to the feature.

parameterdescription.para: the vector join information
the feature of the target layer

briefdescription.para: Find out what is the first index of the join within fields.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns -1 if join is not present
QGIS 2.6

briefdescription.para: Finds the vector join for a layer field index.

parameterdescription.para: this layers attribute index
fields of the vector layer (including joined fields)
Output: field's index in source layer

briefdescription.para: Returns joins where the field of a target layer is considered as an id.

parameterdescription.para: the field of a target layer

briefdescription.para: Reads joins from project file.

detaileddescription.para: Does not resolve layer IDs to layers - call resolveReferences() afterwards

briefdescription.para: Removes a vector layer join.

simplesect.para: true if join was found and successfully removed

briefdescription.para: Resolves layer IDs of joined layers using given project's available layers.
Returns the targeted feature corresponding to the joined feature.

parameterdescription.para: the vector join information
the feature of the joined layer

briefdescription.para: Updates field map with joined attributes.

parameterdescription.para: map to append joined attributes

briefdescription.para: Saves mVectorJoins to xml under the layer node.
Returns a vector of indices for use in join based on field names from the layer.
Emitted whenever the list of joined fields changes (e.g.

detaileddescription.para:
added join or joined layer's fields change)
QGIS 2.6

briefdescription.para: Caches attributes of join layer in memory if QgsVectorJoinInfo.memoryCache is true (and the cache is not already there)
Manages joined fields for a vector layer.
